page.title: 05COMMUNITY SCHOOLS
page.content: In this area there are four community schools.After 6pm. and at weekends and holidays the community take over the facilities of the school. A community director and deputies form the management structure. Activities include evening classes from arts and beekeeping to Victorian dolls and yoga. Holidays are helped along by play groups for children of all ages. Weddings and other celebrations are catered for. Most have integral bars for a drink after the various activities. Old people are catered for with social afternoons and old time dancing. The schools are also becoming focal points for some social needs, hair dressing for the housebound, gardening and activities for mentally handicapped adults. Average attendances are around 3000 to 4000 per week.
